title: Hilariously Late To Crypto Party, Time For Some Action 06.29.22
itunes:title: Hilariously Late To Crypto Party, Time For Some Action 06.29.22
description:
In episode 1277, Jack and Miles are joined by esthetician, podcaster, and host of Beauty Translated, Carmen Laurent, to discuss… VP Harris had a chance to voice a plan…, Time for a Third Party?, Don’t Take Financial Advice From Hostess Twinkies and more!

  1. VP Harris had a chance to voice a plan…
  2. Time for a Third Party?
  3. Is Polarized America Primed for a Breakout Third Party?
  4. New Jersey Centrists Seek to Legalize Their Dream: The Moderate Party
  5. Progressive Backlash in California Fuels Democratic Debate Over Crime
  6. Don’t Take Financial Advice From Hostess Twinkies
  7. Hostess debuts $TWINKcoin snack, inspired by cryptocurrency

  8. Hostess' New Snack Cakes' Name Has Shoppers Confused

  9. Strike threat at Hostess could kill off Twinkies
  10. Have Twinkies Killed the Union Movement?
  11. What Saved Hostess And Twinkies: Automation And Firing 95% Of The Union Workforce

LISTEN: I Got It by Ogi

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
